readme:
# hubot-whywork

A hubot script that queries the front page of whywork for thread info.

See [`src/hubot-whywork.coffee`](src/hubot-whywork.coffee) for full documentation.

## Installation

In hubot project repo, run:

`npm install git+git@git.dope.so:dg4l/hubot-whywork.git --save`

Then add **hubot-whywork** to your `external-scripts.json`:

```json
["hubot-whywork"]
```

## Sample Interaction

```
user1>> hubot dg happy person
hubot>> dougie Is A Happy Person And He's Not Even Sad: http://dg.com/whywork?69
        Author: NotDougie
        Replies: 69 Views: 420
```
